mapper.select: SELECT ol.ORDER_ID, b.BRANCH_NAME, ol.ORDER_DATE, SUM(ol_d.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_QUANTITY, SUM(ol_d.QUANTITY * i.ITEM_PRICE) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, ol.ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDER_LIST ol JOIN BRANCH b ON ol.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO LEFT JOIN ORDER_LIST_DETAIL ol_d ON ol.ORDER_ID = ol_d.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON ol_d.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID GROUP BY ol.ORDER_ID, b.BRANCH_NAME, ol.ORDER_DATE, ol.ORDER_STATUS ORDER BY CASE WHEN ol.ORDER_STATUS = '대기중' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, ol.ORDER_ID DESC

SELECT od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, od.ORDER_ID, od.ITEM_ID, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_CATEGORY, i.ITEM_PRICE, od.QUANTITY, i.ITEM_PRICE * od.QUANTITY AS TOTAL_PRICE, ol.BRANCH_NO FROM ORDER_LIST_DETAIL od JOIN ITEM i ON od.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID JOIN ORDER_LIST ol ON od.ORDER_ID = ol.ORDER_ID WHERE od.ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ORDER BY od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID
SELECT ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

SELECT ol.ORDER_ID, b.BRANCH_NAME, ol.ORDER_DATE, SUM(ol_d.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_QUANTITY, SUM(ol_d.QUANTITY * i.ITEM_PRICE) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, ol.ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDER_LIST ol JOIN BRANCH b ON ol.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN ORDER_LIST_DETAIL ol_d ON ol.ORDER_ID = ol_d.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON ol_d.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE e.EMP_NO = #{empNo} GROUP BY ol.ORDER_ID, b.BRANCH_NAME, ol.ORDER_DATE, ol.ORDER_STATUS ORDER BY CASE WHEN ol.ORDER_STATUS = '대기중' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, ol.ORDER_ID DESC
